greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table read by antidiagonals: V(n,m) = solution to postage stamp problem with n stamps in set, m stamps on letter.
comment: Given n, m, the postage stamp problem is to choose a set of n nonnegative integers such that the sums of m or fewer of these integers can realize the numbers 1, 2, ..., N-1, where N is as large as possible. V(n,m) denotes the value of N.
link: W. F. Lunnon, A postage stamp problem, Comput. J. 12 (1969) 377-380.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 01 2011
